thread.title: BRIEF-Schroder European Says ‍Agreed For City BKK To Surrender Lease At Hamburg Office Asset In Germany

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Schroder European Says ‍Agreed For City BKK To Surrender Lease At Hamburg Office Asset In Germany

organizations.name: city bkk to surrender lease at hamburg office asset in germany feb
schroder european real estate investment trust plc

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Schroder European Real Estate Investment Trust Plc:
* ‍AGREED FOR CITY BKK TO SURRENDER LEASE AT HAMBURG OFFICE ASSET IN GERMANY, IN RETURN FOR CASH PAYMENT TO COMPANY OF EUR 3.9 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
